title: Ep. #117 | Stephanie Poetri's Ultimate K-Pop Playlist
description:
Singer-songwriter and major K-Pop fan, Stephanie Poetri, takes the host's seat and gives us the lowdown on her favorite bops of all time. From classics such as PENTAGON's "Shine" to more recent hits such as StayC's "So Bad", Stephanie offers a range of songs that deserve spots on your favorite playlist!

Thank you Chime for sponsoring this episode! Apply now at https://chime.com/KPOP

Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.
